owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Loyd Tinarwo (University of Fort Hare)
owl:Ontology.terms:description: Xhosa Beadwork Ontology (XBO) is a knowledge representation with a perspective on preservation, promotion, development and management of IK on Xhosa Beadwork. Hence, this ontology creates a common conceptual framework for beadwork using common beadwork knowledge described within Xhosa Beadwork. XBO is anchored on personal ornamentation function of Xhosa Beadwork. The ontology combines many aspects of the associated description of Xhosa Beadwork in order to give a rich classification. This description of Xhosa Beadwork is captured with value partitions and restrictions on beadwork classes. Then a series of defined classes establishes the classification. XBO describes the characteristics of an array of Xhosa Beadwork viz; Headband, Necklace, Armlet, Bracelet, Waistband and Anklet.
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Xhosa Beadwork Ontology

owl:AnnotationProperty.dc:description: Typically, Date will be associated with the creation or availability of the resource. Recommended best practice for encoding the date value is defined in a profile of ISO 8601 [W3CDTF] and follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Date

owl:AnnotationProperty.dc:description: Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, table of contents, reference to a graphical representation of content or a free-text account of the content.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: An account of the content of the resource.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Description

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a Person or Item and the required Age group associated with the use of Item. hasAgeGroup specifies the Age interval or range for which the Item or Person is valid. This allows specifying that a certain Item is valid only for a certain Age group.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasAgeGroup

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates Item to the type of body that the Item is equipped with as determined in the entity ItemBody.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasBodyType

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a Person to another Person (object) who is a child of that Person.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasChild

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an Item to the presence of Colour in the makeup or content of an Item.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasColour

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a specific elaborate design feature or theme of Decoration to an Item.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasDecoration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates a Person to another Person who is the biological Father of that Person.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasFather

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an Item to a type of underlying physical Material used to make or is incorporated in the Item.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasMaterial

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a Person to another Person who is the biological Mother of that Person.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasMother

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates a Person (object) to another to another Person who is a parent of that Person.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasParent

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates the Item with the recommended Position that denotes a point within some BodyRegion where the Item is intended to occupy or be placed or worn.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasPosition

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an Item with a unit of measure Quantity, where Quantity is how much or proportion there is of an Item, Colour or Material. For example, this allows specifying that a certain Quantity is valid only for a certain Item.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasQuantity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a Person or Item to the appropriate type of level or rank or status held by a Person or Item according to classifications or social structure defined in Rank.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasRank

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a Person or Item to the values Male or Female describing Sex. Person or Item is related to an instance of Sex.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSex

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an Item to the Side on which to put the Item relative to a centre or reference location such as the trunk of the human body.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSide

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates the physical magnitude or dimensions used to represent an Item to Size.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSize

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates a Person to another Person in a shared activity of common interest such as a partnership of traditional marriage or common law marriage or civil union.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSpouse

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an Item or Person to a Tribe meaning a group or social division of people an Item or Person belongs to. Tribe is a characteristic such as Thembu, Pondo or Bomvana.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasTribe

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an Item or Person to the appropriate or recommended category of Use for which the Item is intended.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasUse

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links the Item to the recommended Person for whom the Item is considered suitable or eligible Age to adorn or wear or put on the Item.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isWornBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an Item with a particular place, location or region of the human body occupied by an Item as represented in BodyRegion.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isWornOn

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specific Age group value of a Person or suitable age group value intended for an Item.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ageGroup

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Age is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Infanthood, Adolescence, Childhood or Adulthood . NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Age

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class Anklet is used for concepts that represent a beadwork Item in form of a string or band or ring worn around the Ankle.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Anklet

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class Armlet is used to represent a beadwork Item in form of a string or band or ring worn around the Upper Arm or high on the Arm
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Armlet

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class BeadworkEntity comprise concepts that represent objects or items of beadwork and the associated description of the item with respect to the accepted statues of Xhosa Beadwork.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BeadworkEntity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: BodyRegion is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Neck, Waist, Arm, Shin, Head, Ankle or Wrist. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BodyRegion

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: BodyType is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Flexible or Inflexible. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BodyType

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class Bracelet represent an article or beadwork Item in form of a loop or band encircling or worn around the Wrist.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bracelet

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Colour is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Primary, Secondary or Tertiary. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Colour

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Decoration is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Tab, Tassel, Streamer, Strand, Charm or Fringe. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Decoration

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The entire Xhosa Beadwork Ontology (XBO) is underneath DomainEntity. We use DomainEntity for housekeeping, to manage the routine tasks that must be done in order for efficient modelling and XBO functioning i.e. as a common super class in case of a property with multiple domains or ranges.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DomainEntity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class Headband designates a beadwork Item or band or narrow strip worn around the Head.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Headband

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Item is used for concepts that represent a tangible or physical visible Item of beadwork either as a collection or as a single Item of beadwork.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Item

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Material is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Natural or Synthetic. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class Necklace is used represent a beadwork Item in form of a band or string that is worn around the Neck.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Necklace

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class Person contains concepts that denote a human being, regarded as an individual in the physical commonsense intuition and according to the law as the subject of rights and duties as recognized by a culture or country.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class PersonEntity comprise concepts that represent a Person and the associated description of a Person as recognized by the law or the accepted precepts of a culture.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: PersonEntity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Position is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Upper, Middle or Lower. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Position

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Quantity is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Single, Double or Multi. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Quantity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Rank is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Royal, Noble or Common. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rank

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sex is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Male or Female. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sex

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Side is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses LeftSide or RightSide. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Side

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Size is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Small, Medium or Large. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Size

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tribe is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Xhosa, Pondo, Fengu, Bhaca, Bomvana or Thembu. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tribe

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Use is a ValuePartition that describes only values from subclasses Ritual or Ceremony. NB These subclasses can themselves be further partitioned.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Use

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ValuePartition is a pattern that describes a restricted set of classes from which a property can be associated. The parent class is used in restrictions, and the covering axiom means that only members of the subclasses may be used as values. ValuePartition has subclasses Material, Colour, Rank, BodyType, Sex, Tribe, Size, Age, Use, Position, BodyRegion, Decoration, Side and Quantity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ValuePartition

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class Waistband represents a beadwork Item inform of a strip or band encircling or fitting around the Waist.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Waistband
